link.label: a) Jython Console Tutorial
link.text: This Tutorial will show you how to get a Jython console up and running.

link.label: b) Jython Basic Project Tutorial
link.text: This Tutorial will show you how to get a Jython project working, and how to run and debug scripts.

link.label: Python Console Tutorial
link.text: This Tutorial will show you how to get a Python console up and running.
